Class Helpers

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.cpnv.vox.meteor_destroy.Helpers

  • public abstract class Helpers
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all static methods can help us, so we can call them where we want.

    • Method Detail

      • getWidthAdaptToResolution

        public static float getWidthAdaptToResolution(float widthToChange)
        Take the param and return a with adapted to the device resolution which run the game. All my images created for a 1440px width x 2560px height, so I can use a rule of 3 to calculate all width I need for the device.
        Parameters:
        widthToChange - The width you want to adapt
        Returns:
        The new width adapted to your mobile resolution

      • getHeightAdaptToResolution

        public static float getHeightAdaptToResolution(float heightToChange)
        Take the param and return an height adapted to the device resolution which run the game. All my images created for a 1440px width x 2560px height, so I can use a rule of 3 to calculate all heights I need for the device.
        Parameters:
        heightToChange - The height you want to adapt
        Returns:
        The new height adapted to your mobile resolution

      • loadFonts

        public static void loadFonts()
        Method called to load all the fonts we will use.
